typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Australia and Oceania} as string,
		{Papua New Guinea} as string,
		Vegetables as string,
		Offline as string,
		H as string,
		{09/06/2011} as string,
		{229372489} as long,
		{10/18/2011} as string,
		{5272} as long,
		{154.06} as double,
		{90.93} as double,
		{812204.32} as double,
		{479382.96} as double,
		{332821.36} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 filter(H=='H') ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
